content: hey crafters DM scotty here welcome to the DMS craft I have a really cool fit

and toilet paper involved but the end result is well worth it so watch this

all right so there we go got some nice texture on it so what I'm going to do is

yeah glue is dry diver a very respectable gnarly tree here but I want

now what I want to do is I'm going to paint it a dark brown so I'm going to

got a color called Mississippi mud which is kind of like a sickly Brown which is

finished look how great that looks easing it fairly easy to make and very

looks like so there's our party next to the tree
and look how great that looks it really looks like a dead tree you could also
use that for a tree monster so I can move and attack the players it could be
its own figure type what I want to use it for is something a little more
insidious though I want to have a creature smash into the tree the tree
falls down and then any players who look like they'll be hit by the tree would
have to roll roll and do da roll to hit but in other games you'd roll a saving
throw but if they're hit they take damage and they might be pinned under
the trees to say these characters fail they're hit these to get out of the way
they're hit they're trapped under the tree knife you can knock the tree down
like that and these these brant these flexible branches make it easy so if
it's a hard branch it might be sticking up like that but they kind of squinch a
little bit so it's easy to knock that kind of thing down so those characters
might taking a lot of damage be trapped under the tree and the other characters
are trying to free them while they're fighting this crazy thing so you can
have a lot of fun with that and that's what that was my attention for it
because it looks like a regular terrain piece but then you can knock it over
almost as like a spontaneous trap on the player characters when something Giants
smash it you could have a dragon knock it over or pick it up and throw it on
the players or that kind of thing so there we go there's our dead tree like I
say you could also make this a live tree you could add some foliage to it if you
wanted but I was going for the dead tree so there you go and thanks for joining
me and I'll see you next time on the dm's craft hey guys if you're really
